review: The ergonomic remote format is easy to use and the set up with the HDMI stick is painless. The multi media menu is fantastic and gives a lot of choice. Here's a few negatives that detract from this otherwise fantastic gizmo.- - The battery compartment is annoyingly difficult to open, remote wheel buttons are wearing out after a month of use.-  The Tv stick occasionally overheats, causing the menus to freeze and glitch.-  No shopping amazon with the stick (if you can buy media with it, why not stuff through amazon?)- - No internet browsing.- - The smartphone app allowing for key entry does not function for all apps running on the stick ( youtube )
author: Frank Horrigan
